title: Like Tesla, Toyota develops self-driving tech with low-cost cameras - Economic Times
content: Like Tesla, Toyota develops self-driving tech with low-cost cameras  Economic Times
description: Gathering diverse driving data using a massive fleet of cars is critical to developing a robust self-driving car system, but it is costly and not scalable to test autonomous vehicles only with expensive sensors, it said. Woven Planet still uses data collected from other sensors like radars and lidars for training as well as long-term deployment.
